评论概述: Not true to size nor comfy.
评论详情: These pants are not true to size and they’re made very weird. The waist is stiff but ok. The legs are very baggy and stiff. Uncomfortable to try to raise legs. To sit down, you must pull the legs up in order to feel remotely comfortable. If you wear a large as I do, the waist will fit, but the crotch and legs are a rough, stiff material  I don’t recommend. Also the color is not true white, it’s and off white. They’re thin material so you must wear white underwear. Plus, I have a natural tan so you can see my leg color through the pants. Just very odd.
